name: Splash Bash
description: Splash Bash is a hectic local multiplayer brawler, where up to 4 players tries to bash each other into the water using physics based gameplay!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
